title: 07/08/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 07/08/21 DPS Best Of
description:
Jason Smith and Ryan Hollins, in for Dan, react to the latest in the NBA Finals and explain how the Bucks can come back and even the series in Game 2. The guys poke fun at a great John Sterling miscall and Ryan gives insight on what it's like to call play-by-play remotely. The Olympics continue to face major issues with COVID-19. Bucks Radio Color Analyst and Packers Pregame Radio Host Dennis Krause joins the guys to give his thought on Giannis Antetokounmpo playing through his injury and whether or not we should expect Aaron Rodgers in Green Bay at the start of the season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
